name: tsyne
description: Elegant TypeScript wrapper for Fyne - Build beautiful cross-platform desktop UIs with Node.js

scripts.build: npm run build:bridge && npm run build:ts
scripts.build:pkg: npm run build && npx pkg dist/cli/tsynebrowser.js --targets node18-linux-x64 --output pkg/tsyne-browser-linux && cp bin/tsyne-bridge pkg/tsyne-bridge
scripts.test:all: npm run build:bridge && npm run test:root && npm run test:designer && npm run test:examples
scripts.test:root: npm run test:unit:fast && npm run test:gui
scripts.test:integration: npm run build && npm run test:integration:calculator && npm run test:integration:single-script-calculator && npm run test:integration:browser && npm run test:integration:widgets
scripts.test:screenshots: npm run build && npm run test:screenshots:all
scripts.test:screenshots:examples: TSYNE_HEADED=1 TAKE_SCREENSHOTS=1 jest examples/01-hello-world.test.ts examples/02-counter.test.ts examples/03-button-spacer.test.ts examples/04-feedback-form.test.ts examples/05-live-clock.test.ts examples/07-signup-form.test.ts examples/09-players-list.test.ts examples/10-multiplication-table.test.ts examples/11-percentage-clock.test.ts examples/12-shopping-list.test.ts examples/13-tabbed-settings.test.ts examples/calculator.test.ts examples/todomvc.test.ts examples/todomvc-ngshow.test.ts --runInBand
scripts.test:screenshots:browser: TSYNE_HEADED=1 TAKE_SCREENSHOTS=1 jest examples/browser.test.ts examples/browser-enter-key.test.ts examples/browser-home.test.ts examples/browser-page-title.test.ts examples/browser-status-bar.test.ts --runInBand
scripts.test:screenshots:interactive: TSYNE_HEADED=1 TAKE_SCREENSHOTS=1 jest examples/14-color-mixer.test.ts examples/15-tip-calculator.test.ts examples/16-password-generator.test.ts examples/17-stopwatch.test.ts examples/18-dice-roller.test.ts examples/19-bmi-calculator.test.ts examples/20-rock-paper-scissors.test.ts examples/21-quiz-app.test.ts --runInBand
scripts.run:single-script-calculator: npm run build && npx ts-node examples/calculator.ts
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build:bridge:all && npm run build:ts
